other_tests.findings: The pancreas shows lack of visualization of the main pancreatic duct at the level of the head over approximately 2 cm, with minimal upstream dilation. There is mild increased signal on T2-weighted images and decreased signal on T1-weighted sequences, compatible with focal inflammation and consistent with provided history. Mild enhancement of the distal CBD in the region of the pancreatic head. Trace amount of fluid in the anterior pararenal spaces bilaterally.
